titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Office of Vocational and Adult Education for vocational and adult education (rescission numbered R87-31) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 1/29/1987--Introduced. Rescinds budget authority for the Office of Vocational and Adult Education for vocational and adult education (R87-31).
